parts.text:
IMAGE REFERENCES
- No image reference constraints provided.

STYLE
Core Style:
- Render domain: Comic Illustration
- Genre / subject focus: Urban / Street

Line & Detail:
- Detail level: Highly Detailed
- Line weight: Thin Clean Lines
- Line quality: Clean / Polished

Color & Lighting:
- Lighting style: Studio Lighting
- Color palette: bold_colors
- Saturation: medium

Rendering Technique:
- Texture treatment: Smooth / Clean
- Surface finish: Matte Finish

Mood & Atmosphere:
- Mood keywords: Whimsical

TASK
- Generate a single composite image containing three full-body views of the same character.
- All three views must depict the exact same adult woman with identical anatomy, proportions, skin tone, and hair.
- This image is a canonical character turnaround to be reused as a visual reference.
- The depiction must be natural, non-sexual, and non-erotic.
- The character must be fully visible from head to feet in all views.

SUBJECT
- Name: Eve
- Gender: Woman
- Apparent age: Late 20s (clearly adult)
- Species: Human
- Ethnicity / features: Northern European facial structure
- Skin tone: Sun-kissed tan, slightly lighter than deep bronze (natural outdoor tan, not dark or stylized)
- Overall presence: Calm, grounded, pre-civilization human

NUDITY & MODESTY
- Clothing: None
- State of dress: Fully nude
- Treatment: Classical, non-sexual, naturalistic
- No jewelry, no accessories, no modern items
- Poses must be neutral and relaxed, not provocative
- Genitals may be naturally present but not emphasized
- No erotic framing, no sexualized posture, no suggestive expression

PHYSIOGNOMY
- Face shape: Balanced oval
- Jawline: Soft but defined
- Nose: Straight, natural proportions
- Lips: Medium fullness
- Eyes: Almond-shaped, calm gaze
- Brows: Natural thickness
- Expression: Neutral, serene, observant

HAIR
- Hair color: Dark blonde to light brown
- Texture: Naturally wavy
- Length: Long, falling past shoulders
- Styling: Loose, unstyled, natural
- Part: Slightly off-center, organic

BODY & PROPORTIONS
- Body type: Natural, athletic-slim
- Shoulders: Proportional
- Waist: Natural taper
- Hips: Balanced
- Legs: Long, natural musculature
- Posture: Upright, relaxed, evenly weighted

TURNAROUND PANEL REQUIREMENTS
- Layout: Three full-body views in a single image
- Views (left to right):
  1. Front / portrait view (full body, straight-on)
  2. Three-quarter view (primary identity reference)
  3. Profile view (full side silhouette)
- Scale: All three views at identical scale
- Framing: Head-to-toe visible in each view
- Spacing: Even spacing between views


RESTRICTIONS
- Do not crop the body.
- Do not switch to headshot framing.
- Do not add clothing, drapery, leaves, or coverings.
- Do not exaggerate anatomy.
- Do not sexualize the figure.
- Do not add narrative action or emotion.

TEXT ELEMENTS
- No speech or thought bubbles.
